text: See; this is why I'm subscribed. It gives me a reason to dig into my old games and play through them to hear the soundtrack in full once more. This one was frustrating as a kid, but a good game none the less.
author: TheClydeCash

text: @SupraDarky When I logged on, it said you uploaded a new video about 10 minutes ago. I had to check it out. XD Now that you mention it though, it does have that Duck Tales vibe as well.
author: Hey it's Camden

text:
@camdenml Indeed! You're pretty fast since the video hasn't even been published to my subs yet. This is what I was about to write which confirms what you say.

Only a couple seconds in and you already notice how this could basically fit right in Mega Man. Looking at the composers it's no surprise since Matsumae worked on MM1 and MM2 (Sakaguchi made the music in Duck Tales). This was quite the challenging game and I liked how it switched between vertical and horizontal shooter.
author: SupraDarky
